description: Detects suspicious child processes of "provlaunch.exe" which might indicate potential abuse to proxy execution.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: Suspicious Provlaunch.EXE Child Process
query: (event.category:process AND process.parent.executable:/.*\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Vv][Ll][Aa][Uu][Nn][Cc][Hh]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND ((process.executable:(/.*\\[Cc][Aa][Ll][Cc]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Cc][Mm][Dd]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Cc][Ss][Cc][Rr][Ii][Pp][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Mm][Ss][Hh][Tt][Aa]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Nn][Oo][Tt][Ee][Pp][Aa][Dd]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Pp][Ww][Ss][Hh]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Rr][Ee][Gg][Ss][Vv][Rr]32\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Rr][Uu][Nn][Dd][Ll][Ll]32\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Ss][Cc][Rr][Ii][Pp][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)) OR (process.executable:(/.*\:\\[Pp][Ee][Rr][Ff][Ll][Oo][Gg][Ss]\\.*/ OR /.*\:\\[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp]\\.*/ OR /.*\:\\[Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Ss]\\[Pp][Uu][Bb][Ll][Ii][Cc]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\[Tt][Aa][Ss][Kk][Ss]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Tt][Aa][Ss][Kk][Ss]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp]\\.*/))))
